RelatedSentence: Indian media reports ahead of Cabinet formation , Prime Minister - elect Narendra Modi today held discussions with his close aide and Bharathiya Janatha Party general secretary Amit Shah and senior party leader Arun Jaitley even as newly - elected BJP MPs met senior functionaries in New Delhi .

Indian media reports ahead of Cabinet formation , Prime Minister - elect Narendra Modi today held discussions with his close aide and Bharathiya Janatha Party general secretary Amit Shah and senior party leader Arun Jaitley even as newly - elected BJP MPs met senior functionaries in New Delhi .
Modi held the meeting at the Gujarat Bhawan in Chanakyapuri with Shah and Jaitley , who is likely to be inducted in the Cabinet despite losing in the Lok Sabha election .

The Indian daily ' The Hindu ' reported Modi also held a flurry of meetings with former Leader of Opposition in Lok Sabha Sushma Swaraj , Uma Bharti , Varun Gandhi and several newly - elected MPs earlier .

The Indian daily ' The Hindu ' reported Modi also held a flurry of meetings with former Leader of Opposition in Lok Sabha Sushma Swaraj , Uma Bharti , Varun Gandhi and several newly - elected MPs earlier .
However , it is been reported that Sushma Swaraj who was the former opposition leader of the Lok Sabha is expecting one of the portfolios of defence , home affairs , finance or external affairs .

A0: Sushma Swaraj who was the former opposition leader of the Lok Sabha
RelatedSentence: She had discussed his matter with the leaders of all parties .

Meanwhile , Japan today said it will work with the new Indian government to further deepen political and economic ties amid reports that talks were underway for Narendra Modi to visit the country as Prime Minister.Furthermore Nepali Prime Minister Sushil Koirala also invited India 's Prime Minister - designate Narendra Modi to visit his country and expressed hope that bilateral ties between the two neighbours will be further strengthened under his premiership.Singapore Prime Minister Lee Loong invited India 's Prime Minister - designate Narendra Modi to visit his country as well and expressed the hope of raising the bilateral partnership to new heights.In other developments , the Congress rejected resignation of its top two leaders , Sonia and Rahul Gandhi .
